meanings.definition: A type of larva found in marine invertebrates.
meanings.sent1: The trochophores swam gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study trochophores to learn more about marine life.
meanings.sent3: The trochophores had a race to see who could reach the coral reef first.
meanings.sent4: The trochophores danced in the water like tiny ballerinas.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the sight of the trochophores glowing in the dark sea.
